import React from 'react' import firebase from 'firebase' import { auth } from '../firebase.js' import { Button } from '@material-ui/core' function SignIn() { function signInWithGoogle() { const provider = new firebase.auth.GoogleAuthProvider() auth.signInWithPopup(provider) } return (

Chat Room App

Hello! This is a fully functioning chat room loosely cloning a twitch livestreaming chat. It is made using React and Firebase. Firebase if you dont know, is a great backend database that includes auth by signing in with a Google account. Click the button below to get started.

) } export default SignIn
